answer_explanation: Describes the Riemann Hypothesis: All non-trivial zeros of the Riemann zeta function lie on the line Re(s) = ½. This result would reveal hidden order in prime numbers if proven true. Many results and research have been derived from this hypothesis, but it remains one of the most famous unsolved problems
